abstractText: In monitoring the life history of Okanogan River Basin-released hatchery-origin summer/fall Chinook, it is important to monitor the rate at which fish stray to nontarget basins. Relying on data stored in theRMISdatabase, this method estimates the out-of-basin stray rate of Okanogan River Basin-released hatchery-origin fish.
title: Calculating the Brood Year Out-of-Basin Stray Rate for Similkameen Program Hatchery-Origin Summer/Fall Chinook v1.0
